text:
Elisa Giordano (born 1 November 1990) is an Italian rugby union player. She is a member of the Italian national team. She participated at the 2012 FIRA Women's European Championship, 2015 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2016 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2019 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2017 Women's Rugby World Cup, and 2020 Women's Rugby World Cup.
She played wing for Valsugana Rugby Padova.
